      • getLastInsert

        public static long getLastInsert(java.sql.Connection conn)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the last ID that was generated for an auto-increment column. Please note that this does NOT cause transaction problems! last_insert_id() returns the last generated ID on a per-connection basis. See the MySQL documentation at the following location to confirm this: http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/getting-unique-id.html Don't believe me? see AutoIncrementTest
        ??:
        conn -
        ??:
        last generated id
        ??:
        java.sql.SQLException
